title: Cloud SQL - Cloud SQL feature support by database engine
abstract:
# Cloud SQL - Cloud SQL feature support by database engine
This page lists the main features of Cloud SQL and indicates which database engines support these features.
The checkmarks in Table 1 contain links to related topics.
**Table 1. Cloud SQL features**
| Unnamed: 0   | Unnamed: 1        | MySQL | PostgreSQL | SQL Server |
|:--------------------|:-----------------------------------------|:--------|:-------------|:-------------|
| Data protection  | Backups         | ✓  | ✓   | ✓   |
| nan     | Point-in-time recovery (PITR)   | ✓  | ✓   | ✓   |
| nan     | High availability      | ✓  | ✓   | ✓   |
| nan     | Cloning         | ✓  | ✓   | ✓   |
| nan     | Disaster recovery      | ✓  | ✓   | ✓   |
| Data migration  | Data migration to external servers  | ✓  | nan   | nan   |
| Logs    | Instance logging       | ✓  | ✓   | ✓   |
| Planned maintenance | Maintenance windows      | ✓  | ✓   | ✓   |
| nan     | Maintenance controls      | ✓  | ✓   | ✓   |
| nan     | Self service maintenance     | ✓  | ✓   | ✓   |
| Replication   | Read replicas       | ✓  | ✓   | ✓   |
| nan     | Cross-region read replicas    | ✓  | ✓   | ✓   |
| nan     | External read replicas     | ✓  | ✓   | ✓   |
| nan     | Binary logging on read replicas   | ✓  | nan   | nan   |
| nan     | Replication from an external server  | ✓  | ✓   | nan   |
| nan     | Read replica indexes stored procedures | ✓  | nan   | nan   |
| nan     | Logical replication      | nan  | ✓   | nan   |
| Security   | Customer-managed encryption keys (CMEK) | ✓  | ✓   | ✓   |
| nan     | Cloud SQL Auth Proxy support    | ✓  | ✓   | ✓   |
| nan     | Audit logging       | ✓  | ✓   | ✓   |
| nan     | Connection organization policies   | ✓  | ✓   | ✓   |
| nan     | IAM database authentication    | ✓  | ✓   | nan   |
| nan     | Access Transparency (AXT)    | ✓  | ✓   | ✓   |
| nan     | Key Access Justification     | ✓  | ✓   | ✓   |
| nan     | Private Service Connect     | ✓  | ✓   | nan   |
| nan     | Cloud Security Command Center Monitoring | ✓  | ✓   | ✓   |
| nan     | Cloud External Key Manager (EKM)   | ✓  | ✓   | ✓   |
| nan     | VPC Service Controls      | ✓  | ✓   | ✓   |
| Insights   | Query Insights       | ✓  | ✓   | nan
